1d5284dd-a294-44c3-b40d-cc91b2b9f5a4.description: Developed by Faculty Leadership and Success, Information Technology, and the Division of Academic and Student Affairs, this badge recognizes fundamental knowledge in using remote teaching technologies to ensure academic continuity. Topics include remote course development; essentials of Zoom; Canvas basics such as navigation, managing assignments and assessments, writing alternative assessments, communicating course content, connecting with students; and following FERPA guidelines.
1d5284dd-a294-44c3-b40d-cc91b2b9f5a4.name: Remote Teach Ready

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Remote Teach Ready 1 workshop and meet completion and achievement measures outlined in rubric, including: self-reporting and reflection on course design/changes; self-assessment of remote teaching readiness; and reporting remote status of the course in PantherSoft.

The RTR badge can also be earned by successfully completing any of the following related courses: completion of Quality Matters (QM) and/or FIU High Quality certification for a fully online course; completion of Hybrid Certification (Note: Hybrid Master Course Certification does not meet the micro-credentialing requirements); completion of select Hybrid/Tune-up workshops. Each of these courses is assessed by experts in the field and meets or exceeds assessment criteria for the RTR trainings.

71ef5779-5cbe-4421-951d-603e5294d25d.description: Developed by FIU Online, this badge recognizes development of skills and strategies necessary to advance the online student experience. Earners demonstrate competency in developing real-time virtual classrooms, incorporating synchronous sessions, integrating interactive and adaptable engagement opportunities, implementing intentional course development and developing learning modalities where the pedagogical delivery of instruction is enhanced by modern technology.
71ef5779-5cbe-4421-951d-603e5294d25d.name: Online Live

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete appraisal of course content identifying equitable instruction implementation opportunities in the development of their Online LIVE synchronous course.
Successfully evaluate critical concepts and application of immersive communication and implement strategies to best deliver their course content in the Online LIVE synchronous modality.
Successfully utilize and experiment with forms of adaptive engagement strategies to formulate methods to best meet their Online LIVE synchronous course's needs.
Successful completion of a culminating discussion where learners demonstrate the competencies learned and their relationship to the virtual learning experience.

f0971913-fc41-46b2-9925-106b77e4efeb.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in digital evidence collection, processing, and data triage. Earners can apply forensically sound investigative techniques associated with digital evidence; list and describe tools used in a digital forensics investigation; and identify, preserve, extract, analyze and report forensic evidence located on digital devices using the appropriate forensic tools.
f0971913-fc41-46b2-9925-106b77e4efeb.name: Digital Forensics Critical Skills Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessments.
Successful completion of performance assessments.
Successful completion of a culminating reflection demonstrating understanding of learning and skills acquired and their applicability to academic and professional growth.

47b6a2f7-ee25-4cef-8347-dee44c0b957c.description: Developed within the Office of Institutional Effectiveness, this badge certifies that earners have completed the Academic Assessment Certificate course and can demonstrate competency in outcome development and curriculum mapping; development of assessment instruments and methods; collecting, reporting and analyzing results; and developing and implementing improvement actions (Closing the Loop).
47b6a2f7-ee25-4cef-8347-dee44c0b957c.name: Academic Assessment

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete module quizzes with a score of 80% or higher.

Design a pedagogically-appropriate assessment report to measure student learning outcomes and/or program outcomes using assessment best practices (Score 70% or higher on their assessment reports based on a rubric ranging from 15 to 25 points).

395743a8-f6cc-42a7-90ee-043ece3725e3.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in the ability to produce quality photographs at a crime scene or in a laboratory setting. Earners can explain the importance of crime scene photography in overall documentation of a crime scene; explain the term "fair and accurate" as it relates to crime scene photography; and capture images of a latent print appropriate for comparison analysis using laptop-based software controls, D-SLR and copy stand.
395743a8-f6cc-42a7-90ee-043ece3725e3.name: Digital Crime Scene Photography Critical Skills

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessments.
Successful completion of performance assessments.
Successful completion of a culminating reflection demonstrating understanding of learning and skills acquired and their applicability to academic and professional growth.

10ea259a-6a87-41fa-9d49-780bb25e5716.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in the ability to recognize, document, collect, preserve and transmit physical evidence for analysis. Earners can prepare and maintain a functional evidence collection kit; explain the significance of chain-of-custody; and demonstrate the ability to recognize, document, collect, preserve and transmit physical evidence for analysis according to recommended guidelines.
10ea259a-6a87-41fa-9d49-780bb25e5716.name: Crime Scene Investigation Critical Skills

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessments.
Successful completion of performance assessments.
Successful completion of a culminating reflection demonstrating understanding of learning and skills acquired and their applicability to academic and professional growth.

a34cd176-7828-43f7-9183-b27da73f398c.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in performing chemical analysis of known and unknown substances such as drugs and explosive materials. Earners can define trace and bulk chemical material; explain how trace material can be transferred; list basic rules of safe chemical material collection; and conduct presumptive and confirmatory testing of known and unknown trace materials using appropriate tools, techniques and processes.
a34cd176-7828-43f7-9183-b27da73f398c.name: Forensic Chemical Analysis Critical Skills

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessments.
Successful completion of performance assessments.
Successful completion of a culminating reflection demonstrating understanding of learning and skills acquired and their applicability to academic and professional growth.

9e8c0201-6be3-465f-be92-97e186e63a09.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in the ability to lift, process and document searchable latent prints. Learners can describe the characteristics and composition of friction ridges; describe how to make invisible prints visible; and apply techniques used to recover latent fingerprints from a variety of surfaces in a field or laboratory environment.
9e8c0201-6be3-465f-be92-97e186e63a09.name: Latent Print Critical Skills Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessments.
Successful completion of performance assessments.
Successful completion of a culminating reflection demonstrating understanding of learning and skills acquired and their applicability to academic and professional growth.

39320a3d-35b3-4e14-ac4b-0bc835410c7a.description: Ofrecido por Florida International University y NextU, los estudiantes que obtienen esta insignia han demostrado dominio de los fundamentos del marketing tradicional y digital. También pueden determinar estrategias, establecer flujos de trabajo y resolver crisis de redes sociales o situaciones de conflicto.
39320a3d-35b3-4e14-ac4b-0bc835410c7a.name: Fundamentos de Social Media

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Finalización exitosa de exámenes relacionados con conceptos básicos de marketing tradicional y digital, y la aplicacion de cada tipo de estrategia.

Finalización exitosa de la evaluación final en la que los alumnos reflexionan y demuestran cómo las competencias adquiridas pueden utilizarse para promover metas personales, profesionales y/o académicas.

f01815fc-eb30-4129-849b-d10b745fc199.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in the ability to investigate a crime scene and to identify and preserve a variety of evidence for use in an investigation. This Mastery badge recognizes the ability to perform general crime scene processing, photographic documentation, digital forensics, chemical analysis, and latent print processing.
f01815fc-eb30-4129-849b-d10b745fc199.name: Crime Scene Investigation/Exploitation and Analysis Mastery Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Crime Scene Investigation Critical Skills
Digital Crime Scene Photography Critical Skills
Digital Forensics Critical Skills Badge
Forensic Chemical Analysis Critical Skills
Latent Print Critical Skills Badge
Complete examinations and performance assessments to demonstrate the knowledge, skills and abilities identified for the competencies.
Complete culminating reflection to demonstrate understanding of competencies and their relationship to academic and professional growth.

a6981a91-a098-4541-8974-320d86a3cd4e.description: Developed within the Department of Public Policy and Administration, this badge recognizes foundational knowledge and skills needed for engaging in data science and machine learning research projects, and exploring and learning advanced data science. Earners understand introductory machine learning courses in their respective disciplinary contexts and are equipped with valuable tools to begin careers as public policy, administration, affairs, and other related social science professionals.
a6981a91-a098-4541-8974-320d86a3cd4e.name: Data Science for Public Policy

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of related module quizzes and discussions, addressing the learner's understanding on various topics within Data Science for Public Policy.
Successful completion of assessments identifying a policy problem and applying appropriate machine learning algorithms.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

c41689fa-f960-44d3-bc8c-120216e0c727.description: Developed within the FIU Foundation and Office of Inclusive Philanthropy, this badge recognizes fundamental knowledge in understanding the steps to establish an Office of Inclusive Philanthropy. Earners can identify initiatives gaps and need-based funding to support DEI Initiatives at the university and college/unit levels. Earners of this badge are equipped with valuable tools to help create a case statement for donors wishing to invest in social justice and equity initiatives.
c41689fa-f960-44d3-bc8c-120216e0c727.name: Diversity, Equity and Inclusion in Fundraising: Inclusive Philanthropy

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of assessments where learners identify essential initiative gaps at the institutional and college/unit level.
Successful completion of a writing assignment where learners reflect on equity and philanthropy.
Successful completion of an online assessment addressing the learners understanding of the module content.
Successful completion of a case statement outline where learners utilize the valuable tools provided to demonstrate understanding of content.

85715b74-8613-448d-a355-201252f99b10.description: Ofrecido por Florida International University y NextU, los estudiantes que obtienen esta insignia han demostrado que están en capacidad de diseñar estrategias de marca para hacer negocios de forma orgánica e integrar el mensaje de la marca en todas las comunicaciones. Adicionalmente, están equipados para planificar un modelo de incentivos y analizar opciones de trabajo con personas influyentes para aumentar el tamaño de las comunidades de redes sociales.
85715b74-8613-448d-a355-201252f99b10.name: Fundamentos de Community Management en Social Media

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Finalización exitosa de exámenes relacionados con opciones de trabajo con influencers para asegurarse de que la marca llegue a más personas y diseñar estrategias de marca para expandir el negocio orgánicamente, utilizando medios de comunicación social.

Finalización exitosa de la evaluación final en la que los alumnos reflexionan y demuestran cómo las competencias adquiridas pueden utilizarse para promover metas personales, profesionales y/o académicas.

fbcaadcb-23ef-44b5-95a4-624c6c383b87.description: Developed within the Division of Academic and Student Affairs, this badge recognizes training in delivering content aligned to a FIU Quality Enhancement Plan micro-credential. Earners can articulate the value of these credentials for student success in the 21st-century workplace, assess student learning, describe the available learning modalities, develop strategies to promote student completion, and reflect upon and describe the skills needed to deliver a micro-credential.
fbcaadcb-23ef-44b5-95a4-624c6c383b87.name: Quality Enhancement Plan Micro-Credential Alignment

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessments.
Successful evaluation of a student artifact to verify learning/competency.

Successful completion of written assignments where the learner demonstrates an understanding of the meaning of micro-credentials, different available modalities, and strategies to communicate with students about its benefits.

Successful completion of written assignments where the learner identifies the value of micro-credentials, develops strategies to address student attrition, and provides an opportunity for students to share feedback on their experience.

Successful completion of written assignments where the learner is able to reflect on the knowledge gained to integrate micro-credentials into different experiences and assess student competence mastery.

skills.name: Articulate The Benefits And Values Of Micro-Credentials
Develop Strategies To Promote Student Completion

f6fb819b-3230-4efe-b088-51d3f3825a46.description: Developed within the Division of Diversity, Equity and Inclusion, this badge recognizes the ability to evaluate diverse perspectives, develop strategies for co-creating an inclusive environment, and demonstrate effective intercultural communication skills. Earners of this badge demonstrate knowledge through reflections on a series of conversations, completion of applied assessments, and through creation of a diversity, equity, and belonging action plan.
f6fb819b-3230-4efe-b088-51d3f3825a46.name: Foundations of Diversity, Equity, and Belonging in the Workplace

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of four online modules.
Successful completion of related course assessments, self-assessments, and reflections.
Participation in four discussion sessions.
Successful completion of an Inclusive Leadership Development Action Plan and submission of a final self-reflection.

36d9d951-807e-4ce6-ab92-d8bb1f3a7fab.description: Developed by the Association of Public & Land-grant Universities and the Coalition of Urban Serving Universities, earners of this badge can define, identify, and apply key elements of institutional transformation. Earners understand the causes of institutional transformation, how to make contributions to transformation, the costs of transformation, risks related to institutional transformation, and the impact of an institution’s identity as urban-serving on institutional transformation.
36d9d951-807e-4ce6-ab92-d8bb1f3a7fab.name: Principles of Institutional Transformation

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of related assignments assessing key elements related to institutional transformation.
Successful completion of related assignments assessing and refining the definition of institutional transformation.
Successful completion of a stakeholder engagement map.
Successful completion of related assignments describing the drivers, risks, and costs of transformation.

Learners will be able to reflect on what they have learned and describe how these experiences have impacted their view of institutional transformation and how applying this knowledge to their campus may help to drive elements of institutional transformation.

1f517f70-0703-4955-ae45-2b5d8d436500.description: Ofrecido por Florida International University y NextU, los estudiantes que obtienen esta insignia han demostrado conocimiento del proceso de gestión de crisis y establecimiento de acciones en cada etapa. Además, están en capacidad de diseñar protocolos de gestión de la comunicación para las redes sociales e identificar los riesgos a los que está expuesto el negocio.
1f517f70-0703-4955-ae45-2b5d8d436500.name: Manejo de Crisis en Social Media

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

Finalización exitosa de la evaluación final en la que los alumnos reflexionan y demuestran cómo las competencias adquiridas pueden utilizarse para promover metas personales, profesionales y/o académicas.

f48e042e-0ed1-40ee-a818-b4cee99e32df.description: Developed for the Cybersecurity Apprenticeship Program, this badge recognizes the development of career management skills, resume writing skills, and interviewing skills relevant to the cybersecurity profession. Earners understand the different types of cybersecurity roles, can identify the skills needed for those roles, and demonstrate what they have learned through creating a professional resume, and professional development plan.
f48e042e-0ed1-40ee-a818-b4cee99e32df.name: Fundamentals of Cybersecurity Career Management

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of a quiz identifying different safety concerns within the Cybersecurity field.
Successful completion of a paper identifying different Cybersecurity roles while utilizing various job searching tools to enhance an understanding of career pathways.
Creation of a resume.
Successful completion of a template and reflection paper implementing job search strategies.
Successful completion of a paper identifying and assessing the learner’s strengths and weaknesses in preparation for an interview.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

ee7bbe1b-a77e-4f34-82f5-df2df30b9dc5.description: Developed within the Global Forensic and Justice Center, this badge recognizes competency in explaining and properly applying forensically sound methodologies, tools, and techniques used in the collection, preservation and processing of digital evidence. Earners can explain concepts relating to digital evidence; create forensic images using correct methodologies and tools; and locate and extract artifacts of forensic significance from digital devices using forensically methods.
ee7bbe1b-a77e-4f34-82f5-df2df30b9dc5.name: Digital Forensics Fundamental Skills

Successful completion of a culminating reflection explaining how the learning experience contributed to the learner's academic and/or professional goals.

7794c19f-92a9-4bda-969f-af9ab21fad5b.description: Ofrecido por Florida International University y NextU, los estudiantes que obtienen esta insignia pueden identificar las funcionalidades de las redes sociales y la forma adecuada de utilizarlas en estrategias digitales. Además, pueden elegir las redes sociales apropiadas para cada marca y planificar estrategias de marketing utilizando las herramientas disponibles en cada red social.
7794c19f-92a9-4bda-969f-af9ab21fad5b.name: Evaluación de Resultados de Marketing Digital en Social Media

Finalización exitosa de la evaluación final en la que los alumnos reflexionan y demuestran cómo las competencias adquiridas pueden utilizarse para promover metas personales, profesionales y/o académicas.

0da27290-df2d-4e62-bdc9-2d6912775739.description: Developed within the Office of Institutional Effectiveness, this badge recognizes foundational knowledge of the Administrative Assessment process. Earners understand the value of assessment to the mission of FIU, can develop assessment plans to effectively measure outcomes, and are able to use assessment data to inform continuous improvement efforts within their units and programs.
0da27290-df2d-4e62-bdc9-2d6912775739.name: Administrative Assessment

Successful completion of written assignments where the learner demonstrates how to develop outcomes and methods, describe their data collection strategy, and demonstrate how the data collected can be used to inform improvement actions.
Successful completion of a written assignment where the learner is able to reflect on the knowledge gained to integrate the assessment process into their professional work to impact student success.

skills.name: Effectively Measure Program And Operational Outcomes
Use Data To Develop Meaningful Improvement Actions

de13dc47-1d9c-4158-a301-4a8399da0309.description: Developed within the Writing Across the Curriculum program, this badge recognizes that earners can demonstrate effective teaching with writing in a multilingual-majority university. Earners can understand the benefits and methods of incorporating writing into their courses; create writing assignments, including collaborative projects, respond to student writing, use writing in large-cap vs small-cap classes, and leverage the benefits of multilingualism.
de13dc47-1d9c-4158-a301-4a8399da0309.name: Teaching with Writing in the Disciplines

Successful completion of discussions where learners demonstrate understanding of best practices for teaching writing to diverse populations and self-editing.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

b9ef3ac9-d204-4905-93ab-3c566369b275.description: Ofrecido por Florida International University y NextU, los estudiantes que obtienen esta insignia pueden identificar buenas y malas prácticas de la competencia en cuanto a su gestión de redes sociales para tenerlas en cuenta a la hora de crear una estrategia de redes sociales. Adicionalmente, pueden crear un Customer Journey Map para establecer los puntos de interacción de una marca con su público objetivo y diseñar una estrategia de comunicación para las redes sociales.
b9ef3ac9-d204-4905-93ab-3c566369b275.name: Estrategias de Marketing Digital en Social Media

fd01ece3-6054-4137-8282-568ca0853db6.description: Developed within the Jorge M. Perez Metropolitan Center, this badge recognizes competency in practical and conceptual aspects important to the grant proposal-writing process. Earners can identify appropriate grant opportunities and prospective funders, develop content for competitive grant proposals, and effectively write a grant proposal outline.
fd01ece3-6054-4137-8282-568ca0853db6.name: Grant Proposal Development

Successful completion of a Grant proposal outline.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

47b11987-5862-4b05-b66d-871ff3ab57d7.description: Developed within the Robotics Academy, this badge recognizes foundational knowledge in computations thinking for robotics. Earners can define algorithms and list key algorithm components; write pseudocode from a specified robotic task including three data types, variables, functions, and conditionals; identify the structure of a class and when to create classes for their code; and structure basic robotic instructions in the form of pseudocode.
47b11987-5862-4b05-b66d-871ff3ab57d7.name: Computational Thinking for Robotic Processes

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

Successful completion of hands-on assessments and labs.
Successful completion of an exam measuring the learning outcomes.

be8706ca-f230-4210-85df-375c750f0bc5.description: Ofrecido por Florida International University y NextU, los estudiantes que obtienen esta insignia pueden identificar las mejores prácticas en términos de gestión de redes sociales y pueden desarrollar estrategias de redes sociales. Adicionalmente, pueden diseñar una estrategia de comunicación para las redes sociales, definiendo los canales de comunicación, el contenido y el tono de comunicación de la marca.
be8706ca-f230-4210-85df-375c750f0bc5.name: Marketing Digital en Redes Sociales

badge_template_activities.title: Completar las 5 insignias relacionadas con la carrera requerida.

83402a2c-93c1-4fad-8d3d-7276cadd0c3a.description: Developed within the College of Engineering and Computing and the Steven J. Green School of International and Public Affairs, this badge recognizes fundamental knowledge of cyberinfrastructure, its vulnerability vectors, and attacks towards cyberinfrastructure in local government and non-profit organizations. Earners will understand how to mitigate issues including ransomware attacks.
83402a2c-93c1-4fad-8d3d-7276cadd0c3a.name: Cyberinfrastructure Security for Public Service

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of related module quizzes, addressing the learner's understanding on various topics within Cyberinfrastructure Security for Public Sector.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

fd6f6687-cafe-4a64-bc53-b670530d5e9b.description: Developed within the Aquarius Reef Base (Institute of Environment - College of Arts, Sciences, and Education), this badge recognizes knowledge of the physics of diving and its effects on human physiology. Earners can identify diving-related injuries and associated remedies, and understand safe research dive planning, operations and equipment. Earners fulfill partial requirements to become certified scientific divers through FIU.
fd6f6687-cafe-4a64-bc53-b670530d5e9b.name: Fundamentals of Scientific Diving

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of learning modules to gain a fundamental understanding of Scientific Diving as it pertains to the physics of diving and its effects on human physiology, diving-related injuries and associated remedies, as well as safe research dive planning, operations and equipment.
Successful completion of related module quizzes, addressing the learner’s understanding on various topics within Scientific Diving.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

4402cfec-3ed8-4c65-abb9-42135223060a.description: Developed by the Institute of Environment, earners have demonstrated fundamental knowledge of saturation diving by recounting the history and evolution of saturation diving and applying it to the FIU Aquarius Reef Base. Students will explain the physics and physiology of saturation diving and relate it to the benefits of using saturation diving for science. Earners will identify diving emergencies and associated remedies and understand the use and benefits of surface supplied diving.
4402cfec-3ed8-4c65-abb9-42135223060a.name: Introduction to Saturation Diving

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of related module quizzes, addressing the learner’s understanding on various topics within Saturation Diving.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

skills.name: Advantages and Disadvantages of Saturation Diving
Systems and Procedures of Saturation Diving

aadbda87-812a-4ccb-920a-1cdef6000a85.description: Developed within the School of Computing and Information Sciences, this badge recognizes competency in areas such as: (Model-free) Value-Based methods, (Model-free) Policy Gradient methods, Model-based methods, Deep Reinforcement Learning in online settings (Contextual Bandits), Partially Observable Markov Decision Processes (POMDPs) and Inverse Reinforcement Learning.
aadbda87-812a-4ccb-920a-1cdef6000a85.name: Deep Reinforcement Learning

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: One year of Python programming experience.
Machine Learning experience or successful completion of Fast.ai’s Introduction to Machine Learning for Coders.
Successful completion of module quizzes.
Successful completion of a final course project.
Successful completion of an exit evaluation outlining how the learning experience will impact their future practice in this area.

92151566-5da3-4076-9274-763e74428946.description: Developed by StartUP FIU, this badge recognizes competence in business model fundamentals. Earners understand the opportunities business models provide for creating value, innovating and building a competitive advantage. Earners understand innovation in each part of the value chain and alternative approaches to value creation in a business model.
92151566-5da3-4076-9274-763e74428946.name: Fundamentals of Commercializing Research: Business Model Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of hands-on assessments and exercises related to the process of research commercialization.
Successful completion of a Value Proposition Canvas and worksheet related to defining opportunity.
Attendance and participation in required course sessions.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

d2fcd480-666d-4196-b7f9-9bf9c0e1373a.description: Offered by FIU, this badge recognizes competency in working across disciplines to maintain a climate of respect and shared values when working on collaborative initiatives. Earners can use knowledge of one’s own role and responsibilities and those of others to achieve identified goals and outcomes; effectively communicate to support a team approach; and apply relationship-building attitudes and behaviors that foster successful team dynamics.
d2fcd480-666d-4196-b7f9-9bf9c0e1373a.name: Interprofessional Cross-disciplinary Collaboration

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of related module projects, exams and discussions addressing the learner's understanding of developing a shared system of values and ethics, individual versus collective engagement, shared responsibility and accountability contribute to interprofessional cross-disciplinary projects, effective personal and technological communication skills, as well as their ability to identify attitudes and strategies to foster a successful team.
Successful completion of final assessment where learners reflect and demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

098da950-5c3c-471a-a525-fabf8b02f492.description: Offered by FIU to all learners, this badge recognizes foundational data literacy and data communication skills. Earners develop critical data science competencies including the basics of summarizing data, visualizing and interpreting data; data exploration, associations, and causation; identifying potential ethics, privacy, security issues with data; and communicating with data.
098da950-5c3c-471a-a525-fabf8b02f492.name: Thinking and Communicating with Data

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessment identifying the role of data and data repositories in society.
Successful completion of course assessment demonstrating understanding of simple visualizations and summarizations of data repositories.
Successful completion of course assessment interpreting and analyzing data trends and patterns.
Successful completion of course assessment constructing arguments and stories with data and visualizations.
Successful completion of course assessment discussing ethics, privacy, and security issues with data.
Successful completion of a final summative reflection demonstrating understanding of key competencies and their applicability to personal, professional, and academic goals.
Successful completion of a final project consisting of a written paper and a presentation, measuring each of the core concepts covered in the module.

d07d860c-db85-4906-946b-e1764b8028b2.description: Developed by StartUp FIU, this badge recognizes competency in commercializing ideas or research through desirability, feasibility, and viability analyses. Earners understand the role of creativity and innovation in value creation and the fundamentals of how to identify commercial opportunities.
d07d860c-db85-4906-946b-e1764b8028b2.name: Fundamentals of Commercializing Research: Creativity, Opportunity and Creating Value

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

Successful completion of a Value Proposition Canvas and worksheet related to defining opportunity.
Attendance and participation in required course sessions.

dbe68792-90fb-4f60-92c3-3d9532572614.description: Developed within the Office of Micro-Credentials - Academic and Student Affairs, this badge recognizes competency in in developing a Micro-Credential proposal and assessment plan in accordance with Florida International University policies. Earners can define the different steps in the development process, identify the role of Micro-Credentials in higher education, and apply what they have learned to effectively deliver and assess an educational experience aligned to a Micro-Credential.
dbe68792-90fb-4f60-92c3-3d9532572614.name: Micro-Credential Development

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete review of the Micro-Credential resource guide and related assessment.
Successful completion of the required forms for Micro-Credential development, including Proposal and Assessment Forms.
Submission of the required assessment debrief form upon completion of first badge iteration.
Successful completion of an open-ended quiz assessment.
Successful completion of a final reflection addressing the connection between aligning Micro-Credentials to a course or educational experience and the impact on learners.

33bd65ec-25aa-4b4f-95c6-8e9ce7dd75a3.description: Developed by the Council for Undergraduate Academic Advising, this badge recognizes foundational knowledge of key relational competencies critical to advising career development. Earners have demonstrated this knowledge through reflection, and completion of workshops and modules. Earners can recognize and reflect on topics that will influence the future of Higher Education and are equipped with valuable advising leadership skills.
33bd65ec-25aa-4b4f-95c6-8e9ce7dd75a3.name: Advising Leadership Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in all sessions and module activities.
Successful completion of related module quizzes and exams addressing the learner's understanding of various topics within Advising Leadership.
Successful completion of a presentation where learners demonstrate competencies and skills gained through targeted development and strategic partnerships, applying it to their professional pathway.
Successful completion of reflection papers where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

4721868a-34d8-4f40-ab13-e10120993738.description: Offered by FIU to all learners, this badge introduces foundational AI concepts, such as history of the field, key functionalities, how AI is applied, and the potential impact of AI in several sectors.
4721868a-34d8-4f40-ab13-e10120993738.name: Artificial Intelligence: How it Works and its Impact

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

alignments.name: Intelligent Systems (Curriculum Guidelines for Undergraduate Degree Programs in Computer Science)
alignments.description: Intelligent Systems: Fundamental Issues; Basic Search (LO 3); Basic Machine Learning (LOs 1,2,4); Agents (LOs 1 & 3); Advanced Machine Learning (LOs 1,3,4)

alignments.name: Social Issues (Curriculum Guidelines for Undergraduate Degree Programs in Computer Science)
alignments.description: Social Issues: Intellectual Property (LOs 1,2); Privacy & Civil Liberties (LOs 1,2,3); History (LOs 1,2); Economies of Computing (LOs 1,2)

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of course assessment defining core concepts related to and concerns of AI.
Successful completion of a course assessment that describes the overall arc of the history of AI and identifies major milestones.
Successful completion of a course assessment describing several core techniques by which AI systems work.
Successful completion of a course assessment describing the impact that AI is having and will have on the world.
Successful completion of a culminating reflection demonstrating understanding of all AI competencies and their applicability to personal, professional and academic goals.

b94bc758-ff23-4855-b1ad-3e42212548dd.description: Developed within StartUP FIU, this badge recognizes key concepts and approaches to accounting. Learners will be able to define key terms, and analyze and categorize financial entries. Learners will also be able to apply accounting equations to develop a balance sheet, as well as analyze cash flow statements to determine the type of cash flow based on statement items.
b94bc758-ff23-4855-b1ad-3e42212548dd.name: Fundamentals of Accounting for Entrepreneurs

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

entity.name: Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education

Attendance and participation in required course sessions.
Successful completion of a reflection paper where learners demonstrate how the competencies gained can be utilized to further personal, professional and/or academic goals.

0a9b784c-d015-4c65-89bc-de3cb453ac85.description: Developed within FIU Online, this badge recognizes fundamental knowledge of building relationships; and assessing, advancing, and building motivation. Earners of this badge will be equipped and understand the Inside Track KSB model during their student interactions. They are able to assess and advance student development and support students' success in school and beyond.
0a9b784c-d015-4c65-89bc-de3cb453ac85.name: Online Success Coaching Strategies

issuer.summary: issued by Florida International University (FIU) Continuing, Professional, and Executive Education
